mapper.select: select count(ase.is_manage) include from asset_safety_equipment ase left join asset on ase.asset_id = asset.id where ase.is_manage = 1 and asset.asset_status in (7,8,9,10) and asset.status = 1 and ase.status = 1

select count(ase.is_manage) include from asset_safety_equipment ase left join asset on ase.asset_id = asset.id where ase.is_manage = 0 and asset.asset_status in (7,8,9,10) and asset.status = 1 and ase.status = 1

select count(ase.is_manage) include from asset_safety_equipment ase left join asset on ase.asset_id = asset.id left join asset_status_monitor asm on asm.asset_id = ase.asset_id where ase.is_manage = 1 and asset.asset_status in (7,8,9,10) and asset.net_status = 1 and asset.status = 1 and ase.status = 1 and asm.gmt_modified > #{startTime} and asm.gmt_modified <= #{endTime}
